Package moteur

Class DrawDeck

  • java.lang.Object
    • moteur.DrawDeck
  • public class DrawDeck
extends java.lang.Object
    The draw deck.

    At the state of setting up, Place the reference card face-up in the middle of the play area. Then shuffle the 16 suit cards and the Jester together face-down. Deal 2 cards face up beside the reference card: these cards are the trophies. Place the remaining cards face down as the draw deck.

    The DrasDeck is an ensemble of cards (CardsAJouer), which we will place in the collection of java.util.LinkedList.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      DrawDeck()
      Constructor, it will automatically initialize the collection cards and set the indicator numCardDD to zero.
